summary: Comprehensive testing of WineStudy expansion features completed successfully. All new educational content, region/grape detail pages, intermediate/advanced lessons, and navigation features are working correctly. Backend APIs are 100% functional and frontend integration is excellent.
passed_tests: API /api/study/tracks/intermediate/lessons returns 8 lessons correctly
API /api/study/tracks/advanced/lessons returns 4 lessons correctly
API /api/quiz/tracks/intermediate/questions returns 6 questions
Region detail page (/atlas/region/bordeaux) shows terroir, climate, wine styles, appellations
Grape detail page (/grapes/cabernet_sauvignon) shows aromatic profile, structure, best regions
Intermediate lessons are accessible with 8 lessons displayed
Advanced lessons are accessible with 4 lessons displayed
Quiz has new questions for intermediate and advanced tracks
Navigation from Atlas to Region detail works correctly
Navigation from Grapes list to Grape detail works correctly
Breadcrumb navigation works on both region and grape detail pages
Cross-linking between regions and grapes works bidirectionally
Study track cards show correct lesson counts (8 for intermediate, 4 for advanced)
All backend APIs return correct data with 100% success rate
Frontend loads all new content without errors
Region detail page displays all required sections (terroir, climate, wine styles, appellations)
Grape detail page displays all required sections (aromatic profile, structure, best regions)
Navigation between pages is smooth and functional
Breadcrumb navigation provides proper back navigation
Study tracks are properly categorized and accessible
